item.title: How to create a simple floating menu with HTML and CSS
item.description: Introduction Creating a floating menu in HTML and CSS can be a great way to add navigation to your website without taking up too much space. In this blog post, we’ll go over how to create a simple floating menu using HTML and CSS. HTML First, we’ll create the HTML structure for our floating menu. We’ll use an unordered list to hold the links, and a div to hold the entire menu.
